errors.camera_permission_required: Camera permission is required for exercise tracking
errors.failed_load_setup_data: Failed to load workout setup data: {error}

plan.generated_message: Your personalized workout plan "{planName}" has been created successfully!
plan.title: Workout Plan
plan.generate_first: It looks like you don't have a workout plan yet. Please generate one first.

setup.complete_message: Your workout profile has been saved successfully!

generation.title: Workout Plan Generation
generation.analyzing_profile: Our AI trainer is analyzing your fitness profile and creating a personalized workout plan just for you.
generation.tip: This usually takes 30-60 seconds depending on your device capabilities.
generation.ready_description: Your workout setup is complete! Tap the button below to generate your personalized workout plan.
generation.default_error: An unexpected error occurred while generating your workout plan.

counselor.title: Counselor
counselor.end_chat_question: Are you sure you want to end the chat?
counselor.processing_description: This process helps improve your experience by extracting useful information from the conversation for future reference. All extracted information stays on your device.
counselor.cancel_processing_question: Are you sure you want to cancel the processing? This will discard any progress made.

ai_models.title: AI Models Initialization
ai_models.download_description: Models are downloaded only the first time you open the app
ai_models.permission_notification_message: We need permission to show download progress notification
ai_models.wait_download_complete: Wait until the ongoing download complete before retrying this one.

voice_model_selection.title: Choose AI Models
voice_model_selection.description: Select the models that best fit your device's performance:
voice_model_selection.chat_model_advanced_description: Higher quality responses with better reasoning capabilities
voice_model_selection.chat_model_advanced_performance: Recommended minimum 8GB RAM to accommodate other models
voice_model_selection.chat_model_lite_performance: Recommended minimum 6GB RAM to accommodate other models
voice_model_selection.gemma_models_preview_warning: Gemma 3n models *for mobile* are still in preview and may sometimes output unexpected responses (less common with E4B).
voice_model_selection.advanced_description: Near-human quality with natural speech patterns.
voice_model_selection.advanced_performance: May have small delays on devices like Samsung S21 Ultra and below (varies based on device performance)
voice_model_selection.lite_description: Faster response with slightly robotic quality.
voice_model_selection.lite_performance: Recommended for Samsung S21 Ultra and lower-end devices for an optimal experience.

health.health_connect_required: Install the Health Connect App to see your wellness insights
health.permissions_required: Enable health data access to see your wellness insights

calendar.no_upcoming_events: No upcoming events in the next 7 days

meditation.title: Meditation
meditation.no_meditations_description: Create your first personalized meditation guide to begin your mindfulness journey.
meditation.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this meditation?
